programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E04 Pistol Packing Families
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E30 Ransacked
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E12 Pour One Out
programme.desc: Rather than stop, a driver decides to lead police on a high-speed chase. A woman is shot at by her ‘sugar daddy.’ A fleeing suspect dumps a suspicious liquid out of his window.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E31 Lightening Shock
programme.desc: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E16 Amnesia Can Happen
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E24 Naked Camping
programme.desc: A man wearing women’s underwear exposes himself to a couple and the incident is caught on tape. Officers question a naked man in the backseat of a vehicle who claims to be camping.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E16 Where There’s Smoke
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E20 Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E19 Nightvision
programme.desc: A man on a late-night bike ride is stopped by officers for not having a headlamp. A suspect in a domestic dispute admits to hitting a woman. A man doesn’t deal with being laughed at by his neighbor in a peaceful way.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E20 College Nightmare
programme.desc: The victim of a home invasion was held at gunpoint. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 A Breakdown Takedown
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E09 What’s my name again?
programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E23 UC Drug Sting II
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A bio-hazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E35 Domestic Headbanger
programme.desc: A vehicular pursuit in Florida comes to a head when the driver careens into a ditch. An officer responds to a troubling domestic call. An intoxicated brawler is taken into custody.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E03 Mardi Gras Grifter
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E07 Chainsaw Man
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E15 Bumper Cars
programme.desc: A man rams his wife’s car into his daughter’s car. Deputies find a rifle in a suspect’s car that was in a prior altercation. A man claims to run a travel business after deputies find evidence of id theft.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E12 ID Please
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E06 Sharp Knives and Dirty Donuts
programme.desc: A customer pulls out a knife when asked to leave the store. A man doing donuts in a motel parking lot is questioned about a love triangle. Officers are flagged down by a man who was shot at while riding his bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E05 Call the Manager
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E04 Hitman for Hire
programme.desc: Police set up a undercover operation to bust a suspect who wants to hire a hit man to kill her husband. Unknown to her, the hit man she hired is an undercover police officer. The suspect denies doing anything wrong despite all of her crimes being caught on camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E13 Rooted with Problems
programme.desc: A sibling calls authorities when his belligerent brother refuses to leave. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle at a local gas station.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E17 Family Therapy
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn. A father threatens his daughter and her boyfriend with a knife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E10 Running in Traffic
programme.desc: A fleeing suspect takes officers on a wild chase through oncoming traffic. Surveillance footage of a stabbing helps police find the vicious attacker. Cops track a subject into an uncooperative stranger’s apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E07 Boat Guy
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed chase with a motorcyclist. A man becomes verbally abusive with a woman and her mother after a boating trip. Police seize a rifle and 20 rounds of ammo from a man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E23 Behind Blue Eyes
programme.desc: An officer assists a routine traffic stop which results in a DUI arrest. A drug related arrest is made in a high crime area. A man with a revoked driver’s license is placed under arrest and a prostitute is let go with a warning.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E13 High Jump Fail
programme.desc: A family with kids is taken on a high speed car chase. A intoxicated suspect tries to jump a fence while protesting that he’s not trying to run away. A jealous boyfriend terrorizes his girlfriend and her parents.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E15 Late Night Snacks
programme.desc: A fleeing vehicle goes for a spin when officers execute a perfect PIT maneuver. Cops try to flush out a suspect who barricades himself inside a donut shop. Officers hit the meth mother lode when they stop a truck in a downpour.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E05 Kiss & Make Up
programme.desc: Officers question a couple looking to score. Officers respond to a domestic violence call in which it is unclear what exactly transpired. Officers assist on a shots fired call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E27 Truck Trunks
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E14 My Mom's Car
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit quickly comes to a head after the driver loses control. A Florida man driving a stolen vehicle claims it belongs to his parents. Arrests are made in a Florida prostitute sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E21 Going Upstream
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E08 Grand Theft Auto
programme.desc: Deputies are called to a vehicle burglary in progress at an apartment complex. A traffic stop results in the discovery of drug paraphernalia. An Officer locates a stolen van and discovers drug paraphernalia in the suspect’s purse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E03 Take out Orders
programme.desc: Officers investigate a fiasco at a fast food restaurant. A routine pullover results in a drug possession arrest. A vehicular pursuit results in an ill fated foot chase, the suspect is taken to jail for an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E26 Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A jaywalker darts on a mad dash through the weeds. Things go badly for a suspect on a stolen motorcycle when choppers help officers track him down. A domestic dispute leads cops to a slew of unexpected crimes.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E14 If the Shoe Fits
programme.desc: Two suspects wreck their vehicle while attempting to evade police in a hot pursuit. Officers respond to a domestic dispute involving neighbors. A suspect abandons his truck and shoes while running from Officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E34 Deceptive Dealings
programme.desc: Prostitute sting operations prove successful for undercover officers. Officers inform an unsuspecting John that the individual offering services is not who he thinks they are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E22 That’s Not Nice
programme.desc: Officers spot a suspected stolen vehicle and a pursuit ensues. Officers are called to a fight at a bar over a tossed drink. Police are called to the scene of two intoxicated siblings arguing.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E35 Vampire Woman
programme.desc: A woman tells Officers she’s a vampire. Officers question a colorful man dressed as a woman. A violent woman screams obscenities at Officers and needs to be restrained.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E28 Tell it to My Wife
programme.desc: A man’s wife can’t help him stay out of jail no matter how much he calls for her. One thief tries to give back his stolen loot. When approached by officers, a woman goes from passed out to out of control.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E36 New Digs
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E09 Pretty White Lies
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E02 Read the Signs
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E32 Thrifting and Shoplifting
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E31 Bruised But Not Broken
programme.desc: Deputies assist an injured woman who vows revenge on her male attackers. A woman tells Deputies her husband beat her in front of their children. Officers protect an elderly woman from an abusive child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E06 Kill ‘Em With Kindness
programme.desc: A belligerent gun-toting man doesn't take too well to some harsh parental criticism. A bike rider tries to outpace a policeman then pretends to be someone else. Officers try to coax a rattled hit-and-run driver into coming clean.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E06 Life Changing Moment
programme.desc: An officer attempts to pull over a man on a bicycle who refuses to stop. An officer arrests two suspects involved in a drug deal who attempt to discard the evidence. An officer questions a driver leaving a known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E22 Turbo Charged
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E20 Pup and Rescue
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E10 Playing Hooky
programme.desc: Officers engage in a foot pursuit after the passenger of a suspicious vehicle starts running. A man barricades himself in the house after stabbing his nephew. A teenager is caught ditching school to smoke marijuana.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E12 On the Run
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E26 Pub Rules
programme.desc: A prostitution sting leads police to uncover additional crimes. A prostitute tells deputies she wanted money to buy her daughter a birthday gift. Deputies are called to an assault at a pub.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E16 Never Been Busted
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E30 The One Dollar Shoe
programme.desc: A well-known local nuisance gets caught bothering people once again. Officers get a kick out of a usual suspect with money in his shoe. Cops try to make sense of a man who’s barely coherent and barely dressed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.desc: Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!

programme.title: School's Out For Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 School's Out For Summer!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Who Had The Most Hits In The 70s?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Had The Most Hits In The 70s?
programme.desc: Our special countdown of the 30 acts with the most UK Top Ten Hits in the 1970s features legends like Bowie, Queen, Abba, Bee Gees, Elton and more. But the No.1 will surprise you!

programme.title: School's Out For Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 School's Out For Summer!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Earth Wind & Fire v Sunshine Band!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth Wind & Fire v Sunshine Band!
programme.desc: 30 minutes of funk & disco from 2 of the biggest feelgood bands of the decade!

programme.title: School's Out For Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 School's Out For Summer!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Pop Party! 70-75
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Tony Blackburn's Pop Party! 70-75
programme.desc: Blackburn's your man for the ultimate early 70s party playlist. How about some pure pop cheese from big names & forgotten acts that'll have you singing your head off? Let's bop!

programme.title: School's Out For Summer!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 School's Out For Summer!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: 40 Biggest Pop Groups of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 40 Biggest Pop Groups of the 70s!
programme.desc: Pop Groups ruled the 70s and they came from all quarters! From Germany's Boney M, Sweden's Abba & America's Village People to the UK's Queen, Police & Showaddywaddy.

programme.title: 1973 Unleashed!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 1973 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1973!

programme.title: The Complete Abba! 1973-2022
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Complete Abba! 1973-2022
programme.desc: Quite simply the biggest hits from the biggest pop act of the 70s & now back for the 2020s - Abba! 32 songs, 9 UK number 1s.

programme.title: It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Bad Hair - Big Tunes!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's Bad Hair - Big Tunes!
programme.desc: The hairvolution of rock'n'roll - the good, the bad, and the ugly. Pat Sharp is back with a countdown of classic 70s songs accompanied by dodgy 70s hair-don'ts!

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Coffee, Tea
programme.desc: Caffeine isn't just to get you going in the morning. Chef Spencer Watts shows how tea and coffee can add a lot of flavour to tuna and mussels.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 White Fish Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Skilled Chef Katie Ardington is excited to introduce her favourite fish, striped sea bass, in this fabulous voyage through the 7 seas of seafood cookery.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Chicken Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Chef-host Natalia Machado loves chicken, and who doesn't? Chicken is enjoyed around the world for good reason; it is versatile and reliably delicious!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 Salad Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Salad is a wonderful addition to any meal, and sometimes even a meal on its own"... today, the talented Chef Craig Wong shares several of his superior salad ideas.

programme.title: Cook Like A Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Pork Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Snout to tail cooking is Chef Derek Dammann's specialty, in this episode celebrating pork, he cooks everything but the squeal!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Ceviche, Fried Rice, Tacos and Hot Pot
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, arctic char ceviche! Next, duck-lychee fried rice! Followed by vegan king oyster tacos! Finishing with kimchi hot pot!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu

programme.title: The 3 Best
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Snapper
programme.desc: Snapper is a delicious fish prepared in countries all over the world! These three regional snapper recipes are the very best! First, a trip to Lebanon for some spicy Beirut snapper. Next, let's see what's cooking down south with a Venezuelan fried snapper with plantains! And for the fin-tastic finale, a classic Italian pancetta wrapped snapper with pea mash!"

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Veneto
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Basilicata
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. programme.desc: Seafood enthusiast and Chef Spencer Watts shows how easy and incredibly delicious cooking a whole fish or shellfish can be as he makes snapper and crab.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Crusted/Coated
programme.desc: High-energy chef and seafood expert Spencer Watts shows how crusts and coatings add tantalizing texture to rich tuna and fresh, tangy oysters.

programme.title: Fish the Dish

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Gondar, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline learns about the history of Ethiopia at the Gondar Castle, and goes on to explore the stunning, rock-hewn Lalibela churches.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccon Chronicles The Ballad of Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur (ENG)
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Quest Bihar, India
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Axum, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline explores the ruins of Aksum, the heart of ancient Ethiopia. Next, she tries the Ethiopian coffee ceremony and hyena feeding in Harar.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccon Chronicles One Flew Over Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Quest Mumbai 1, India
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Among Japan’s best kept secrets is its very own Venice with an oriental flavour to it. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit this hidden gem, and learn a little about Kyushu’s history and Samurai, the legendary Japanese warriors. They also witness an enchanting garden, that is the perfect combination of the creativity of nature and human beings.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Off The Grid Omo Valley, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Omo Valley, Emeline visits the Hamer, Karo and Dassanach tribes, and learns about their distinct culture and curious traditions.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccon Chronicles Uncharted Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Quest Mumbai 2, India
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Burn Appetit Vienna, Austria
programme.desc: In Vienna, Jolly chances upon a Baroque palace that houses mysteries of not only the world in which we live but also of the heavens above.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Unwind Amatra, India (ENG)
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia, Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Da Nang this week with World Spas and take a peek into the life of the pampered few.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka (ENG)
programme.desc: Successful actress and travel enthusiast, Indeya Passfield visits Kandy in search of rejuvenation. From the Zen at Sri Dalada Maligawa temple and nature therapy at Royal Forest Park in Uddawatekele to delectable Sri Lankan fare and relaxing massages at her resort, she finds it in every experience she has in Kandy. She also explores the local arts and crafts at the Kandyan Arts Association.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Burn Appetit Riegersberg, Austria
programme.desc: On the way to Graz from Vienna, Jolly makes an unexpected discovery: a medieval castle on a volcano, which is home to a dungeon of witches.
