programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Burn Appetit Alpbach, Austria
programme.desc: Jolly leaves behind the Styrian region and heads to the Alps, on his adventure across Austria, where gastronomy meets adrenalin.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan Landour, India
programme.desc: Rohan and his furry friend, Healer, lose themselves in the English charm of the misty hamlet of Landour.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unplanned Trip Jairampur
programme.desc: Roshni’s journey gets off to a rocky start in Jairampur when everything goes wrong.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 City Breaks Singapore
programme.desc: With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the Lion City: Singapore.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Off The Grid Monte De Crystal, Gabon
programme.desc: Get ready to take on exciting wildlife adventures of Monte De Crystal with Emeline. The national park enveloped by misty clouds adds an ethereal feeling to nature’s canvas.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: The caldera, Mount Aso, is home to Japan’s most active volcano. It is also the perfect destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and some breathtaking views. Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Burn Appetit Rattenberg, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Travel Diaries of Healer and Healer and Rohan Auli, India
programme.desc: Rohan introduces his spirited canine companion, Healer, to snow for the very first time at Auli, a popular hill station in Uttarakhand.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Unplanned Trip Namsai
programme.desc: A striking golden Buddhist shrine in Namsai draws Roshni to it. She learns the secret behind the peaceful lives led by the monks here.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Great World Hotels Desroches 1, Seychelles
programme.desc: Looking for fun and relaxation, Freishia visits Seychelles, where she ends up having the beach holiday of a lifetime.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Off The Grid Lope National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Emeline puts on her adventurous garb as she strolls around the gorgeous rainforest and savanna of Lope National Park.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Burn Appetit Zillertal, Austria
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Austrian Alps' most highly glaciated section, Zillertal offers Jolly the thrills of winter in summer.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By the Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Vallettand Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unplanned Trip Hawai
programme.desc: On a visit to Hawai, the land of the Mishmi tribe, Roshni stays with some members of the tribe, who treat her to a rather potent local brew.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Desroches 2, Seychelles
programme.desc: From visiting a tortoise feeding pen to taking a cycle tour around Desroche island, Freishia gets to reconnect with nature in Seychelles.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 City Breaks Munich, Germany
programme.desc: Often called Germany's most livable city, Munich is also one of its most historic, artistic, and entertaining cities. Until 1871, it was the capital of an independent Bavaria. Kristina Guberman admires the elegance of the city through its attractions such as the Gothic city palace, Residenz, the popular Marienplatz square and the stylish BMW Museum.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Burn Appetit Ziller Valley, Austria
programme.desc: On his way from Zillertal to Innsbruck, Jolly makes some rather fascinating pit-stops that lead him to uncover shades of Austria’s heritage.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By the Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys Popeye Village.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unplanned Trip Roing
programme.desc: In Roing, Roshni visits the local market and tries an infamous chilli that has reduced seasoned foodies to tears.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: The abundant natural and man-made wonders of Norway tell stories of its long and rich history.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Unwind Amatra, India (ENG)
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Burn Appetit Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta’Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unplanned Trip Pasighat
programme.desc: Attending a tea festival in Pasighat gives Roshni the chance to savour some of the most premium varieties of tea produced in Arunachal Pradesh.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Landmarks Trafalgar Square (ENG)
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 City Breaks Cologne, Germany
programme.desc: Christina visits the 2000 year old city of Cologne and delves into museums dedicated to chocolate to museums showcasing world's greatest art.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Unplanned Trip Mechuka
programme.desc: From paragliding to ziplining, the adventures Roshni has in Mechuka give her an intense adrenaline rush.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Be it the world’s tallest building or one of the world’s largest man-made marinas, Dubai has always been a city firmly in charge of writing its own story. Renowned traveler, Sabrina discovers this, as she visits Dubai’s own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos. She also learns about the city's roots at Bastakiya, the old quarter full of sand-colored houses with open courtyards and narrow alleyways, and Al Fahidi Fort, the city's oldest structure.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Landmarks Dead Sea, Jordan
programme.desc: Find out some of the most fascinating facts about the lake in southern Israel where it is nearly impossible to drown.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Off The Grid Loango National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Step into the wilds of Loango where you’ll see unique lowland gorillas, elephants and wild buffaloes blissfully strolling in their natural habitats.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Unwind Hotel Ellbee, India
programme.desc: Rishikesh, the heartland of yoga, is widely known for mystical stories, spiritual awakenings, rejuvenation and peace. Travel enthusiast, Larissa D’Sa comes to Rishikesh looking for a relaxing getaway, and loses herself in its natural beauty. From relishing earthy Garhwali flavours to witnessing the larger-than-life Ganga aarti, her experiences in the land, where great sages and famous musicians came to find peace, help her to unwind.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan Almora, India
programme.desc: Rohan discovers interesting stories about Almora through its sights such as Kasar Devi and art forms such as Aipan paintings.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Burn Appetit Graz, Austria
programme.desc: Set among the farms and vineyards of Styria, the city of Graz has quietly become the culinary crowning jewel of Austria.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta’Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Burn Appetit Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Be it the world’s tallest building or one of the world’s largest man-made marinas, Dubai has always been a city firmly in charge of writing its own story. Renowned traveler, Sabrina discovers this, as she visits Dubai’s own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos. She also learns about the city's roots at Bastakiya, the old quarter full of sand-colored houses with open courtyards and narrow alleyways, and Al Fahidi Fort, the city's oldest structure.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Unplanned Trip Mechuka
programme.desc: From paragliding to ziplining, the adventures Roshni has in Mechuka give her an intense adrenaline rush.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Landmarks Dead Sea, Jordan
programme.desc: Find out some of the most fascinating facts about the lake in southern Israel where it is nearly impossible to drown.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 City Breaks Cologne, Germany
programme.desc: Christina visits the 2000 year old city of Cologne and delves into museums dedicated to chocolate to museums showcasing world's greatest art.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Unwind Hotel Ellbee, India
programme.desc: Rishikesh, the heartland of yoga, is widely known for mystical stories, spiritual awakenings, rejuvenation and peace. Travel enthusiast, Larissa D’Sa comes to Rishikesh looking for a relaxing getaway, and loses herself in its natural beauty. From relishing earthy Garhwali flavours to witnessing the larger-than-life Ganga aarti, her experiences in the land, where great sages and famous musicians came to find peace, help her to unwind.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Off The Grid Loango National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Step into the wilds of Loango where you’ll see unique lowland gorillas, elephants and wild buffaloes blissfully strolling in their natural habitats.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Rohan and Healer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Diaries of Healer and Rohan Almora, India
programme.desc: Rohan discovers interesting stories about Almora through its sights such as Kasar Devi and art forms such as Aipan paintings.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Burn Appetit Graz, Austria
programme.desc: Set among the farms and vineyards of Styria, the city of Graz has quietly become the culinary crowning jewel of Austria.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Off The Grid Monte De Crystal, Gabon
programme.desc: Get ready to take on exciting wildlife adventures of Monte De Crystal with Emeline. The national park enveloped by misty clouds adds an ethereal feeling to nature’s canvas.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.desc: Roshni’s journey gets off to a rocky start in Jairampur when everything goes wrong.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Beyond the ROX
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever as new competitors challenge the veterans. The women’s field is growing fast, and expert coaching is helping athletes reach new heights. Who will come out on top?

programme.title: Beyond the ROX
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Beyond the ROX
programme.desc: Raw reactions show how the joy, anxiety, and pride that drive athletes are shared by their loved ones. As rivalries heat up, a wildcard competitor shakes things up, adding more drama to the race.

programme.title: Red Bull TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull TV

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Next Centimeter

programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Natalia Grossman made history as the first American in 20 years to win the Climbing World Cup. Now she returns to defend her title. Can she stay on top or will someone take her place?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbing stars Babsi and Jacopo face their biggest test: free climbing the 3,000-foot Eternal Flame on Pakistan’s Nameless Tower. It’s tough, risky and only a few have tried before. Will the succeed?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 Reel Rock
programme.desc: With cold weather closing in, Babsi and Jacopo race to finish their climb. Hard climbs and freezing temps test their strength. Will they reach the top before time runs out?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Seb Bouin climbs his tough DNA (9c) route in France with tricky moves and tiny holds. This hard challenge shows he pushes the limits of what people can do on rock.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbers Leo, Anna, and jungle expert Waldo take on Mount Roraima’s steep prow. They aim to climb a new, tough route. Will they reach the top or face the mountain’s challenge?

programme.title: Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.desc: Fred Beckey, the legendary 'Dirtbag' mountaineer, inspires with his daring climbs and bold lifestyle. Learn about his pioneering ascents and the legacy that makes him a climbing icon.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 Reel Rock
programme.desc: After three tough climbs, Anna Taylor faces the hardest pitch yet. She must succeed to keep the team’s dream of a free climb alive. Will she make it or fall short?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbing legend Chris Sharma finds a mega project in Siurana, Spain. The Sleeping Lion wakes his fierce side as he takes on one of his toughest climbs yet.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold tackles a brutal 35-mile solo climb with 24,000ft of gain and hundreds of pitches on Red Rock Canyon’s rough sandstone walls. Can he finish this epic challenge alone?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold finishes nine climbs under the hot sun. With nine more to go, he faces Red Rock Canyon’s hardest climb as night falls.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Waters
programme.desc: Nouria Newman, the world’s top kayaker, is an Extreme Kayaking Champion and the first woman to conquer Salto del Maule in Chile. She’s always breaking records and pushing the limits of the sport.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E01 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Australian star Angie Scarth-Johnson teams up with climber Hazel Findlay to tackle Mallorca’s best deep-water soloing routes. It’s a thrilling mix of skill and adventure in stunning locations!

programme.title: Reel Rock

programme.title: Reel Rock

programme.title: Episode 3: The future for adventure bikes
programme.desc: In this episode Graham takes a look at what the future holds for Adventure Bike, and what advantages electric engines can offer. Tales from the Trails sees the boys visit an abandoned airfield that used to be an F1 track. Sam talks about his inspiration from within the adventure market and it's Sam's turn for a 24 hour adventure.

programme.title: 2024-2025 ALMS: Round 4 - 4 Hours of Dubai
programme.desc: Relive all the excitement from Round 4 of the Asian Le Mans Series! As the second race of the weekend, it delivered non-stop action, with a red flag sparking intense strategy shifts and thrilling moments across the field. Don't miss the highlights!

programme.title: George Drives the 1955 British Grand Prix Winning Mercedes F1 Car
programme.desc: Seventy years on from Sir Stirling Moss becoming the first Englishman to win the British Grand Prix, we honoured the famous legacy by bringing the Mercedes W196 back to Aintree for the first time since 1955. George Russell came with us - and he definitely enjoyed his time behind the wheel!

programme.title: 'Feels like yesterday' - Álex Crivillé looks back on his legendary career
programme.desc: MotoGP Hall of Famer and 500cc 1999 World Champion Álex Crivillé talks to us about his incredible career and what his predictions are for the current stars of MotoGP. From his biggest rivals, to bike evolutions and his current favourite equestrian hobbies. Criville tells us all about it here at Motorsport.

programme.title: Round 1: Rosario - Race 2
programme.desc: Watch the second race of the first round of the 2025 TCR South America season in Rosario, Argentina.

programme.title: Nigel Mansell: Il Leone
programme.desc: In this exclusive interview with Peter Windsor, Nigel talks about his career, his life and what drives him to the edge of everything that matters.

programme.title: Rainer Schlegelmilch: Freezing Speed
programme.desc: In a Motorsport Network exclusive, this new film gives an incredible insight into the working life of Rainer Schlegelmilch, who is the only photographer to have been honoured with a lifetime F1 photographers accreditation.

programme.title: It's Time To Get Excited About Hydrogen Powered Race Cars
programme.desc: Hydrogen power is developing at a breakneck speed, and for Motorsport development, AVL is leading the charge. We visited AVL's headquarters in Graz, Austria, to find out just how they're developing a Hydrogen powered race car, and how it compares to the real thing in their state-of-the-art simulator. Thanks to AVL for providing access to their HQ and for sponsoring this video!

programme.title: When broken Porsches staggered to Le Mans victory
programme.desc: With 9 Porsche 956s finishing in the top 10, the 1983 24 Hours of Le Mans was a truly remarkable feat for Porsche. But just exactly how did they win? In this episode of “Short View Back to the Past”, Autosport Chief Editor Kevin Turner recalls the time that a very broken Porsche 956 won Le Mans.

programme.title: What REALLY Happened when F1 Drivers Went On Strike
programme.desc: Being a Formula 1 driver is one of those dream jobs, but that doesn’t mean everything always runs smoothly. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when the F1 drivers went on strike.

programme.title: How Do F1 Teams Test & Develop Components?
programme.desc: Putting components through their paces to maximise reliability and performance! Mike Elliott, Technology Director, talks us through what happens in the Test & Development department!

programme.title: Giorgio Piola's incredible career in motorsport
programme.desc: For the last 40 years, Giorgio has profiled every change in design and engineering for every car on the grid. Here we take a look at his incredible career.

programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the second round of the Michelin Le Mans Cup at Le Castellet.

programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the second round of the European Le Mans Series at Le Castellet.

programme.title: Round 1: Donington Park
programme.desc: Watch the first round of the 2025 British GT Championship at Donington Park.

programme.title: From Wheelchair to Race Car: Robert Wickens takes on the World’s Toughest Street Circuit
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: How This Troubled Car Drove F1's Greatest Qualifying Lap
programme.desc: From Senna to Schumacher to Hamilton, there are some great qualifiers in Formula 1, but who exactly has had the best qualifying lap in F1 history? In this episode of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner picks out F1’s greatest qualifying laps.

programme.title: How Controversy at Imola Changed F1 Forever
programme.desc: Imola kicks off the European Formula 1 season in 2022 - the track has a rich history, but it’s also one filled with drama, controversy and tragedy – from intra-team fights to battles for the control of the sport and one of motorsport’s worst weekends. In the latest of our new "A Short View Back to the Past" series, Autosport's Chief Editor Kevin Turner takes a look at some of the most important moments in Imola’s rollercoaster story.

programme.title: The fastest F1 cars to never win a championship
programme.desc: Some cars obliterate the F1 field but once in a while, luck runs out and even the fastest cars and drivers can't win. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner reveals F1’s fastest failures.

programme.title: How Controversy at Imola Changed F1 Forever
programme.desc: Imola kicks off the European Formula 1 season in 2022 - the track has a rich history, but it’s also one filled with drama, controversy and tragedy – from intra-team fights to battles for the control of the sport and one of motorsport’s worst weekends. In the latest of our new "A Short View Back to the Past" series, Autosport's Chief Editor Kevin Turner takes a look at some of the most important moments in Imola’s rollercoaster story.

programme.title: The fastest F1 cars to never win a championship
programme.desc: Some cars obliterate the F1 field but once in a while, luck runs out and even the fastest cars and drivers can't win. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner reveals F1’s fastest failures.

programme.title: Gérard Larrousse: Man of many racing talents
programme.desc: Peter Windsor meets Gerard Larrousse, the former rally driver, double Le Mans winner, F1 driver, Renault F1 Team Manager and F1 team owner, in his home in Marseille, France.

programme.title: MLMC 2025: Round 2 - Le Castellet Highlights
programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the second round of the Michelin Le Mans Cup at Le Castellet.

programme.title: ELMS 2025: Round 2 - Le Castellet Highlights
programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the second round of the European Le Mans Series at Le Castellet.

programme.title: Round 1: Donington Park
programme.desc: Watch the first round of the 2025 British GT Championship at Donington Park.

programme.title: From Wheelchair to Race Car: Robert Wickens takes on the World’s Toughest Street Circuit
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E41 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2024

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E51 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)

programme.title: Kahuna
programme.desc: Four young engineering students set sail from Lorient, France, in March 2022 aboard Kahuna, their self-built electric sailboat. For five months, they explored the Arctic slopes of Norway and Svalbard, mastering skiing, sailing, filming and climbed 40 peaks.

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 1

programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022

programme.sub-title: S01 : E34 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Dreams
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2019
programme.desc: Three world titles were up for grabs in Verbier today with the familiar combination of nerves and excitement always present at this legendary venue, and the world's best did not disappoint.

programme.title: Total Fight 2019 - Snowboard - Grandvalira (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2019
programme.desc: Total Fight is an invitational international competition directed to the best riders in the international freeski and snowboard scene. They fight in a battle for the best style in the "El Tarter Snowpark", one of Europe's best Areas for freestyle action.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Dreams
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Kahuna
programme.desc: Four young engineering students set sail from Lorient, France, in March 2022 aboard Kahuna, their self-built electric sailboat. For five months, they explored the Arctic slopes of Norway and Svalbard, mastering skiing, sailing, filming and climbed 40 peaks.

programme.title: Beach Wrestling World Series Finals 2022
programme.sub-title: S01 : E50 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022
programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 - Season Recap
programme.sub-title: S01 : E51 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022
programme.desc: An epic season of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 has come to an end and we take a look back at the highlights of the tour. So enjoy the water-Action of some of the best freestyle windsurfers of the world.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #02
programme.sub-title: S01 : E52 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2022
programme.desc: This will focus on our Continental Cups of Halfpipe and Slopestyle at Cardrona Alpine resort and will feature not only kiwi Olympians, but also Junior World Champions Ruby Andrews and Gustav Legnavsky, as well as international stars.

programme.title: S'abandonner au Sauvage
programme.desc: S'abandonner au Sauvage is an adventure in total autonomy without any canoeing experience on the waters of an over 500km long canadian river.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Prologue
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cape Epic 2025
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 2
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: WOF 2025 #28: Queen & King of the Court 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: The spectacular Queen & King of the Court 2025 beach volleyball event returns to Hamburg from May 23 to 25! For the fifth time in a row, the best players in the world will compete against each other in Hamburg. Level brought to life.

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2022
programme.desc: The 2022 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in ist 15th season in January - as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! Right at the beginning a brand-new stop in Baqueira Beret (ESP) awaits the athletes.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2022
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2021
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.
